sentences.sContent: Moreover, it offers the expressiveness which helps to “simplify complex tasks”.
sentences.sContent_eng: Moreover, it offers the expressiveness which helps to “simplify complex tasks”.
sentences.sCn: 此外，它更具表现力，这有助于“简化复杂任务”。

sentences.sContent: If these issues are not handled well, the benefits of generic types can easily be outweighed by decreases in expressiveness and robustness.
sentences.sContent_eng: If these issues are not handled well, the benefits of generic types can easily be outweighed by decreases in expressiveness and robustness.
sentences.sCn: 如果这些问题处理得不当，那么可表达性和健壮性的降低会轻易地抵消泛型类型的好处。

sentences.sContent: AOP does not replace existing programming paradigms and languages; instead, it works with them to improve their expressiveness and utility.
sentences.sContent_eng: AOP does not replace existing programming paradigms and languages; instead, it works with them to improve their expressiveness and utility.
sentences.sCn: AOP并不 替换现存的程序范例或语言，而是 与 它们协同工作以提高他们的表达能力与效用。

words.tran: 表现的；有表现力的；表达…的
表现地；意味深长地；表示地
快车，快递，专使；捷运公司
表达，表示；表情；表现力；措辞
